title: Added a new package entry point (`import { registerAllEditors, registerAllRenderers, registerAllValidators, registerAllCellTypes, registerAllPlugins } from 'handsontable/registry'`) that allows importing build-in modules in one function call. Especially this can be useful for application that uses a modularized version of Handsontable (`import Handsontable from 'handsontable/base'`).
